name: Medieval Mayhem (itch) (AdamS.AttackCrab)
description:
Play a variety of short fast-paced team based minigames where one players intentions are not as they seem.

~~~~~~~~~

FEATURES

~~~~~~~~~

4-Player Online Co-op

Play with 4 of your friends in an online party game like no other!

Traitorous Twist

In each minigame one of your friends is chosen as a traitor sent to sabotage your goal. Who is it? Keep your eye out as you get to vote at the end of the round!

~~~~~~~~~

THE TEAM

~~~~~~~~~

Tom - Team Lead

Corey - Level Designer

Jesse - Lead Programmer

Nadyne - Level Designer
